named-query.name: EXPIRED_FAILED_ORDER_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT o.uidPk FROM OrderImpl AS o WHERE o.status = 'FAILED' AND o.createdDate <= ?1

named-query.name: DISABLE_DEPENDENCY_ORDER_SKU_ON_SHIPMENT
named-query.query: UPDATE OrderSkuImpl osku SET osku.shipment = null WHERE osku.orderUidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: DELETE_ORDERS_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: DELETE FROM OrderImpl o WHERE o.uidPk IN (:list)
